has.name: has
has.short_desc: Returns whether a cached value for a setting from the loaded cache exists, that matches the given criterias.
has.hint_desc: true if value for that setting is in cache; false otherwise

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: group name of setting, default is null and matches always

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: setting type to match, default is null and matches always

get.name: get
get.short_desc: Returns the first setting from the loaded cache that matches the given criterias.

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: group name of setting, default is null and matches always

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: setting type to match, default is null and matches always

getAll.name: getAll
getAll.short_desc: Returns an array of settings matching the given criterias.
getAll.hint_desc: of setting instances matching the specification
exceptions: if $groups is neither null nor a string or an array

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: name of a group or array of group names or null for all settings regardless of group

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: only return settings that match the given flag value

load.name: load
load.short_desc: Loads the settings from the configured or default location.
load.hint_desc: true, if reading from cache succeeded; false otherwise.
exceptions: on invalid or broken cache file

setLocation.name: setLocation
setLocation.short_desc: Sets the given location as the cache location to use.
setLocation.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

getLocation.name: getLocation
getLocation.short_desc: Returns the location currently set on the cache.

setParameters.name: setParameters
setParameters.short_desc: Runtime parameters to configure the cache operations.
setParameters.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support
